website_summaries.verdict: This high-end liquid formula is a great choice for those who have trouble swallowing pills.
pros: Liquid whole-food based vegetarian vitamin taken from more than 120 veggies and fruits
Loaded with amino and omega fatty acids as well as prebiotics
Many users note a difference in their energy, hair and nail strength
cons: Some customers struggle with the formula's flavor

customer_reviews.title: Blood Lab
customer_reviews.text: I literally, practically live on this! This product is my major source of nutrition. This trully is the Ultimate! My recent blood lab can prove it.
customer_reviews.author: MDPRIEST

customer_reviews.title: Liquified Liver?
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking Nature's Plus multivitamins for a long time. They make excellent supplements. I've always taken the pill form and thought I'd switch things up and try the liquid form. This automatically gets a one-star detection for the flavor. The Taste is so bad it tastes like liquefied liver, gallbladders, and insects. Anyone that says this taste good needs to have an exorcism performed on them. I know... it's a multivitamin. something like this should not taste good but this taste pretty bad. I will most certainly go back to taking the pill form lol
customer_reviews.author: David Drake

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is amazing – will not disappoint – that thicker hair and ...
customer_reviews.text: Gosh, this stuff is amazing – will not disappoint – that thicker hair and better fingernails are added bonus – I feel better and more energetic
customer_reviews.author: LookingUp

customer_reviews.title: Nature's Plus Source of Life Gold
customer_reviews.text: Due to a medical condition I needed liquid vitamins and Nature's Plus is great. Pleasant taste and fair price. Each bottle last me a month.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug93021

customer_reviews.title: ENERGY ENERGY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these vitamins a year ago, loved the way it made me feel. When I ran out I could definitely feel the difference. Well I decided to try another version, that was an all natural brand....NOTHING!!!!!! ORdered the Liquid Gold again and have been taken it for 2 weeks now, I immediately felt the difference in 3 days!!! when I tell you these vitamins are the best they are! I also have started my husband on them! and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not delicious but Beneficially. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. It gives me a full burst of energy throughout the day and even at times I forget to stop and take a break. Warning: if you care about the color of your piss changing or the smell of your piss throughout the day, then this is not for you. Also, the taste is not the best. The energy burst and nutrition is the main goal for me and it surpasses all expectations on that front.
customer_reviews.author: Yetta J

customer_reviews.title: Makes taking vitamins easy
customer_reviews.text: I feel energized and healthy when I take this consistently. Because I only have to take one cap full it's so easy to be consistent . I like the liquid and my teenagers take the gummies. I went from taking 12 vitamins a day (when I could remember) to just one Cap of this. I like the taste slightly tart goes down easy. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Viloria

customer_reviews.title: This might be working
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t taste bad but to me it doesn’t taste great. But if it works I don’t care what it tastes like. I live with chronic pain that knocks the hell out of me-can’t remember the last time I had a good day where I felt I could function like a normal person and having some energy to clean a little.
customer_reviews.author: Jeaniebean

customer_reviews.title: Liquid vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product, because i really don't like to swallow pills, but I need a good quality vitamin. The color is very dark green and a little off-putting. However, the taste is pleasant and it is very easy to take. My family tried it too, and agreed that the taste is good. I can tell the difference in my energy level when I take this product. For me, it's a win, and no pills to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: m.j.

customer_reviews.title: Love love them- quality is worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.text: I love these vitamins, I’ve been taking them on and off for the last couple of years now. I just recently tried a different brand of liquid vitamin but I don’t feel nearly as good as I felt taking these. After I finished up this bottle, I will be re-purchasing this. These may be expensive but they are well worth it, I work 12 hour shifts and I am are surrounded by people who are catching colds, flus, or viruses. These vitamins really contribute to keeping my immune system up.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: It got here fast in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that was highly recommended to me due to the fact that I have absorption issues. It is not a bad taste at all as I was concerned it could be. I do notice a positive difference in how I feel taking it. I also take it in tablet form when we travel. Tablet form is 3 huge monster tablets for one serving so the liquid is far more tolerable. As much as I prefer to buy local the price difference was significant enough that I chose this seller online. At this price point I will continue to buy here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUST DO IT
customer_reviews.text: If believe in this product 1000%. First time I took it I could feel my body almost tingling with joy. I take it almost 5x a week now & my energy level stays constant all day.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: No more bone pain!
customer_reviews.text: I had some bone pain and weakness in my hands and arms from a vitamin D3 and B12 deficiency. Within about 2 weeks it was gone! I’ve been drinking a shot of this daily now for more than a year and have no more pain! I have stopped it a time or two and the pain came right back, this stuff works!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Love it, keep it in the fridge
customer_reviews.text: My body seems to react well to it. I have more energy, skin start to look more vibrant, and, no more constipation either. It's worth the money, so I'll reorder when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Very potent
customer_reviews.text: 4th one I purchased... Works great for my 67 year old mom... Brightens her face and she has less GI problems.
customer_reviews.author: Compton

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer liquid vitamins for their efficient absorption, and this one is a keeper. I tried it after using several others. This one helps me “go” in the mornings after taking it, and keeps me energized during the day.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for me, as I need vitamins but struggle with taking large pills. It also tastes good!
customer_reviews.author: BeMe

customer_reviews.title: Superb Product
customer_reviews.text: I hate taking big pills, so I opted to try this product because it had all of the vitamins and minerals I needed in an easy-to-swallow form. I "tried" it two bottles ago, and now it is the only supplement of this type that I will take. This is the third time I've ordered this through Amazon because I get the same product as I can get from my health food store but a little cheaper. I absolutely love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rene' B.

customer_reviews.title: Supplement you can feel working.
customer_reviews.text: Want a supplement you can feel take affect and has almost everything you need bam. I take this every day can feel it giving me energy and vitality as well as digestive regulation and more. Place a drop on your tounge to check for allergies before taking a full cap.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best liquid vitamin on the market. I drink a capful every morning and i feel like I am getting a burst of Spring in my mouth. Plus it is full of everything your body needs. The only downside is it has gotten really expensive. But, I care about my health so I continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: juli626

customer_reviews.title: This is an exellent supplement.
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor. It's easier to absorb and assimilate into your system than capsules or tablets. It can easily be mixed with any other liquid supplement, such as a protein drink. I love the taste, so I drink it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the most complete liquid vitamin i can find. The taste is better than most, it is not that strong vitamin taste.
customer_reviews.author: pschweizer

customer_reviews.title: Restored my energy, but....
customer_reviews.text: I was really dragging and that's why I purchased this product. I believe it really helped (but I did a liver cleanse beforehand), but it's way too sweet. It's really hard to find the sugar content in the ingredient list and I've been looking for an alternative in their line so I don't have to drink something so sweet (I don't eat sugar). Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Tart but excellent overall flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Love this, some multi vitamins are not appealing flavor wise. Aside for being decently tart, the flavor itself isn't bad at all. Just mix or chase it with water or juice if needed. I'm very happy with it so far. Been using it for 3 months straight now.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica lagola

customer_reviews.title: WOW...Jolt of Energy!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing gives me energy, not even B12 shots from my doctor. I took this and immediately felt it go thru my system & woke me up! But I did not feel jittery or shaky. I really like the taste too, like sweet tarts. If you like the taste of sweet tarts then you will like this and it will be easy to swallow. I think that it is amazing and I will purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Perkswife

customer_reviews.title: Good liquid vitamin that recharges the body
customer_reviews.text: Used this a few times over the years and love the way it re-energizes me. I can feel it working so I know it's providing the nutrients I need. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Cedrick

customer_reviews.title: Great absorbency and my energy increased
customer_reviews.text: The taste can get a few day to get used to but then your body adjust because now I can drink shots of it and not cringe. Great absorbency and I can see an increase in my energy levels.

customer_reviews.title: I love the taste of Nature’s Plus
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of Nature’s Plus. In the month I have been using this vitamin I have had more energy and stamina. The fact that it is easy to take is the most important. Other vitamins stays in the cabinet or refrigerator because you don’t consistently take them because they present this challenge. Nature’s Plus provide all the vitamins you need in one cap full.

customer_reviews.title: Good liquid multi-vitamin, disgusting flavor.

customer_reviews.title: Great multivitamin

My buddy who is a body builder tried it after my recommendation and had the same results. You have to try this. Will be a part of my daily regimen and stack from now on.

customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it takes good, and gives me plenty of energy throughout the day! I mostly use a cap full in my morning smoothie!
customer_reviews.author: krandle

customer_reviews.title: I like both products very well
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I used Nature Plus, liquid gold. I have used Nature-Way Alive liquid in the past. I like both products very well, I will be switching back to Nature's Way Alive Liquid, because the Nature's Plus Liquid Gold is more expensive. I rate both products about the same value. Thanks, bilbut
customer_reviews.author: Bill Butner

product_meta.title: NaturesPlus Source of Life Gold Liquid - 30 fl oz - Tropical Fruit Flavor - Daily High Potency, Organic Whole Food Multivitamin, Prebiotic Complex - Vegetarian, Gluten-Free - 30 Servings
feature_bullets: GOLD STANDARD: Our formula is the GOLD STANDARD for whole food-based multivitamin supplementation. Source of Life provides more energizing, antioxidant, and anti-aging power then ever before, and retains high quality and guaranteed potency.

SPECIAL INGREDIENTS: Source of Life GOLD Liquid contains Vitamins A B12 C D3 K2, our organic B-complex blend, B12 1000 mcg for exceptional blood support and over 120 fruits and vegetables. It is hypoallergenic, gluten-free, and completely iron free.

COMPLEX FOR YOUR BODY: In addition to the vitamins, we added a complete array of all essential and non-essential amino acids, whole food omega fatty acids, a prebiotic complex, and an enzyme-rich whole food blend.
QUALITY MANUFACTURING: Our state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities maintain continuous adherence to cGMP compliance, superior standards, and are FDA and NSF registered.
